[00:00.00]BLIND (Explicit) - DaBaby/Young Thug
[00:00.53]Lyrics by：Jonathan Lyndale Kirk/Wesley Tyler Glass
[00:01.07]Composed by：Jonathan Lyndale Kirk/Wesley Tyler Glass
[00:01.60]DaBaby：
[00:02.14]Yeah yeah yeah
[00:08.09]I've been blind for a while now
[00:12.34]I just got the key they let me in no ID
[00:14.65]Doors openin' up for me and now I see
[00:16.99]I've been blind for a while now
[00:19.81]I've been blind for a while now
[00:21.59]Ayy I've been blind hey
[00:24.07]Every single godd**n day a n***a think he next to leak it
[00:26.18]Next to who
[00:26.91]Tomatoes mustard mayonnaise
[00:27.89]N***a better catch up catch up catch up catch up
[00:29.53]Yup yup yup
[00:30.02]Thankful that my head too hard for me to learn my lesson
[00:31.91]My head too godd**n hard
[00:32.64]'Cause the way I did it worked out fine ooh God you blessed me
[00:34.55]Amen
[00:35.28]Probably ain't believe me
[00:36.20]Know a n***a went through hell and back now he finally on the TV
[00:39.06]Yeah
[00:39.29]Now a n***a don't even give a f**k no more probably think it's easy
[00:42.45]Let you know it ain't easy
[00:43.82]I f**k her like a Bathing Ape she run from the d**k like a cheetah
[00:47.08]Go
[00:47.49]Two-tone AP watch on never see me use it for a clock
[00:50.07]Tick tock
[00:50.39]They see the way he f**kin' up the charts
[00:51.64]Hmm
[00:51.85]I wonder is he ever gon' stop
[00:52.98]And he charge a hundred-fifty for the verses now
[00:54.75]Pay it or he never ever drop
[00:56.04]They noticed that a n***a music versatile
[00:57.79]Wonder if he ever goin' pop
[00:58.82]Go
[00:58.98]DaBaby/Young Thug：
[00:59.41]I just got the key they let me in no ID
[01:01.81]Doors openin' up for me and now I see
[01:04.01]I've been blind for a while now
[01:06.75]Blind
[01:07.16]I've been blind for a while now
[01:08.58]Blind
[01:10.07]Let's go
[01:11.03]I just got the key they let me in no ID
[01:13.60]Doors openin' up for me and now I see
[01:15.89]I've been blind for a while now
[01:18.63]I've been blind for a while now
[01:20.84]Young Thug：
[01:21.85]Yeah
[01:22.33]I've been quarantined livin' with my kiddies
[01:24.66]Tryna teach me how to cha-cha woah
[01:27.83]F**ked around left the door open
[01:29.14]Now they know that they can't stop me
[01:30.96]Don't place me in no cop car
[01:33.45]Yeah I'm off probation so it's gas I blow
[01:36.79]I found love in my b***h so I don't ask no more
[01:39.57]I can really sit back ain't gotta pass no dough
[01:42.13]All of my brothers get loot I don't got ride with pistols
[01:44.92]Yeah
[01:45.27]They found him dead he dissed you
[01:46.40]Woah
[01:46.71]PTDS don't you tell me you lost me
[01:49.37]Woo
[01:49.53]F**k all the rest none them b***hes are a nominee
[01:52.48]Go to the head whenever dogs with me die
[01:54.84]Got me riding 'til the sun come blood on my white 1's
[01:58.19]Both：
[01:58.33]I just got the key they let me in no ID
[02:00.69]Doors openin' up for me and now I see
[02:02.89]I've been blind for a while now
[02:05.66]Blind
[02:05.71]Yeah I've been blind for a while now yeah
[02:09.07]Let's go
[02:10.00]I just got the key they let me in no ID
[02:12.53]Doors openin' up for me and now I see
[02:14.72]I've been blind for a while now
[02:17.47]I've been blind for a while now
[02:20.65]Yeah

[00:08.09]我已经盲目过活了好久
[00:12.34]我有钥匙 他们放我进去 无需验证身份
[00:14.65]大门为我敞开 现在我知道了
[00:16.99]我已经盲目过活了好久
[00:19.81]我已经盲目过活了好久
[00:21.59]我一直好盲目
[00:24.07]每一天 那家伙都觉得他会泄露机密
[00:26.18]什么事情来着
[00:26.91]西红柿 芥末 蛋黄酱
[00:27.89]兄弟最好跟紧点
[00:29.53]//
[00:30.02]谢天谢地 我的思想坚定 就是不会吸取教训
[00:31.91]我的思想太坚定
[00:32.64]因为我的做法成效还可以 上帝 你保佑了我
[00:34.55]阿门
[00:35.28]可能不会相信我
[00:36.20]要知道 我走过鬼门关 现在终于上了电视
[00:39.06]//
[00:39.29]现在我已经什么都不在乎 你可能觉得这很容易
[00:42.45]我告诉你 这不容易
[00:43.82]我和她疯狂缠绵 她受不了 疯狂逃 就像逃避野兽
[00:47.08]//
[00:47.49]双色爱彼手表戴在手腕上 我当然不是用它来看时间的
[00:50.07]滴滴嗒嗒
[00:50.39]他们知道为什么他的歌总能霸占排行榜
[00:51.64]//
[00:51.85]我就在想 他是不是永远不会停下来
[00:52.98]现在他一首歌就要收费十五万
[00:54.75]不付钱 他就不发歌
[00:56.04]他们发现这家伙的音乐风格多变
[00:57.79]不知道他会不会火遍全球

[00:58.98]//

[01:39.57]我可以安安静静地过活 不需要再拼命
